location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: 'File 2/20 Residency Surgeon's Inspection Report on Bahrain Agency Hospital'

physicalDescription.extent: The papers in the file are arranged chronologically. There are file notes at the end, on folios 27-33. The notes are arranged chronologically and refer to documents within the file.

Foliation: the main foliation sequence (used for referencing) commences at the front cover with 1, and terminates at the inside back cover with 34; these numbers are written in pencil, are circled, and are located in the top right corner of the recto side of each folio. An additional foliation sequence is present in parallel between ff 2-26; these numbers are also written in pencil, but are not circled, and are located in the same position as the main sequence.

mods.abstract: The file contains the Residency Surgeon, Major A L Greenway's, inspection Report on the Victoria Memorial Hospital and on the quarantine arrangements in Bahrain.
